```{r}

# Action button to clear selections made in charts.
# This does not clear any selections made with the input selection
# buttons.

actionButton(inputId = "clear_selection",  
             label = "Clear Graph Selection",
             style = "background-color: #337ab7; 
                      border: 2px solid #8CBBD2;")


# Reactive values to track selections from each chart.
# By default, these are NULL unless a selection is made in a chart. 
# See the 'datatable_main.Rmd' for more info on how this is used.

# Templates

selected_templ <- reactiveVal(NULL)


# Completion

selected_compl <- reactiveVal(NULL)


# Status

selected_stat <- reactiveVal(NULL)


# Observe "Clear Selection" button click to reset filters
# to NULL.

observeEvent(input$clear_selection, {

  selected_templ(NULL) 
  
  selected_compl(NULL) 
  
  selected_stat(NULL) 

})

```
